On reopening, the build.xml was wrongly flagged in error due to a "missing
default compile target", that was simply not true.
The only way to remove the error flag was to close the build.xml editor, close
eclipse, reopen eclipse and edit again build.xml.
As soon as the editor reopened, the error flag disappeared.

The commit was completed since about five minutes when i closed eclipse, so
there was no concurrence between it and the closing.
It is a one time occurrence, and i have not been able to reproduce it again.
